articles.title: Netanyahu Vows to Fully Occupy Gaza as Ceasefire Talks Collapse
articles.description: Israeli Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu has signaled plans to expand military operations to fully occupy the Gaza Strip, following the breakdown of ceasefire negotiations with Hamas.

articles.title: Global Markets Rally Overnight as Fed Rate Cut Expectations Rise
articles.description: Global markets across Asia and Europe posted widespread gains, fueled by speculation that the U.S. Federal Reserve may cut interest rates following weaker-than-expected job data and dovish signals from Fed officials.

articles.title: Texas Republicans Vote to Issue Civil Arrest Warrants for Dozens of Democrats
articles.description: Texas House Republicans authorized the issuance of civil arrest warrants for Democratic state lawmakers who left the state to delay a Republican effort to redraw election maps.
